forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 14C. SW winds shifting to NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 57F. SW winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 11C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 52F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Gusty winds diminishing after midnight. Low 42F. Winds N at 20 to 30 mph. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. High 53F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 43F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 48F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 58F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
